attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
2006 Mercedes-Benz SL500 (R230) in Black Opal Metallic with Black and Anthracite Leather and Wood Trimming Finishes 

-   Full-Service History with Major Service done less than 1 000 km ago
-   Active Xenon Headlights with Daytime
-   Driving Lights
-   Front and Rear Park Distance Control  with Graphic Lighting Display
-   Keyless entry and Keyless Start
-   Electric Operated Retractable Hard Top   
-   Light and Rain Sensor
-   Colour Coded Rims
-   Retractable Side Mirrors
-   Multifunction Steering
-   ABC Sport Suspension Setting with Height Control
-   Power Steering
-   Tiptronic Shift Gearbox
-   Dual Climate Control
-   Memory Seats with Multi Contoured settings as well as Pulse Function
-   Operated Voice Activated Radio with Front Loader CD and 6 CD shuttle
-   BOSE Surround Sound System
-   Steering Operated on Board Computer
-   Electric Stability Program
-   Cruise Control with Active Distronic
-   Run Flat Indicator
-   Active Easy Entry/Exit
-   Boot Lid Opening Limiter
-   Speed Limit Warning
-   Steering Operated Voice Command Bluetooth Audio
-   Heated and Cooling Seats
-   Car has also been fully Ceramic Coated

Finance available through all the Banks and Country Wide delivery can be arranged.
